title: Survivor Turns 25: Season 3 Winner Ethan Zohn Thought His Game Was ‘Ruined’ After Show’s Shocking First Tribe Swap: ‘This Is It, It’s Over’
description: In honor of Survivor’s 25th anniversary on May 31, TVLine is spotlighting the most iconic, unforgettable moments from the series that helped redefine reality television. Today, we’re tackling the show’s very first tribe swap in Season 3, but be sure to revisit the jaw-dropping Borneo finale moment where Sue Hawk had a thing or two to […]
author: Nick Caruso

title: Casting News: House of Villains Reveals Season 3 Cast, Doc Promotes Two Series Regulars and More
description: With production ramping up on Season 3, House of Villains is set to premiere on Peacock in early 2026, populated by an entirely new cast of troublemakers. Well, almost entirely new. Love her or hate her (and isn’t that the point of this show?), VH1 celebreality icon Tiffany “New York” Pollard is returning to the […]
author: Andy Swift

title: Crunchyroll Winter 2023 Simulcast Slate Offers Largest Line-Up Yet
description: The Crunchyroll Winter Simulcast 2023 slate is the biggest anime line-up yet, with TRIGUN STAMPEDE, VINLAND SAGA Season 2, and more!
author: Adi Tantimedh

title: Superman & Lois, James Gunn/DCU, Sandman & More: BCTV Daily Dispatch
description: In today's BCTV Daily Dispatch: James Gunn/DCU/Superman/Henry Cavill, Superman & Lois, SNL, The Sandman, The Nevers/#Westworld & tons more!
